languages.text: {n}Авель тут же отводит взгляд, словно утратив к вам интерес. Но затем его вокс едва слышно произносит:{/n} "Я... рад вам".
{n}Abel immediately looks away as if he has lost all interest in you. But then his vox crackles, barely audibly:{/n} "I... am glad... to see you."
languages.original_text: {n}Авель тут же отводит взгляд, словно утратив к вам интерес. Но затем его вокс едва слышно произносит:{/n} "Я... рад вам".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel looks away at once, as if he's lost all interest in you. Then, however, his vox says, barely audibly,{/n} "I... am glad... to see you."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}アベルはすぐにあなたから興味を失ったかのように目を逸らす。しかし、彼のヴォクスはほとんど聞き取れない音量で告げた。{/n}「あなたに…会えて…光栄です」
languages.original_text: {n}Abel immediately looks away as if he has lost all interest in you. But then his vox crackles, barely audibly:{/n} "I... am glad... to see you."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベルはすぐにあなたから興味を失ったかのように目を逸らす。しかし、彼のヴォクスはほとんど聞き取れない音量で告げた。{/n}「あなたに…会えて…光栄です」
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}亚伯立刻移开了目光，仿佛对你彻底失去了兴趣一样。但随后，他的音阵装置却传来了几乎听不到的声音。{/n}“我……见到你……很高兴。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abel immediately looks away as if he has lost all interest in you. But then his vox crackles, barely audibly:{/n} "I... am glad... to see you."

traits.locale_text: {n}亚伯立刻移开了目光，仿佛对你彻底失去了兴趣一样。然而，他的音阵装置却传来了几乎听不到的声音。{/n}“我……见到你……很高兴。”
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel wendet sofort den Blick ab, als hätte er jedes Interesse an dir verloren. Dann knistert allerdings sein Vox und er verkündet kaum hörbar:{/n} "Ich ... freue mich ... Euch zu sehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Abel immediately looks away as if he has lost all interest in you. But then his vox crackles, barely audibly:{/n} "I... am glad... to see you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel wendet sofort den Blick ab, als hätte er jedes Interesse an dir verloren. Dann jedoch sagt sein Vox kaum hörbar:{/n} "Ich ... freue mich ... Euch zu sehen."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel détourne aussitôt le regard, comme si vous aviez subitement perdu tout intérêt à ses yeux. Cependant, il prononce ces quelques mots d'une voix grésillante, à peine audible :{/n} « Je... suis content... de vous voir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abel immediately looks away as if he has lost all interest in you. But then his vox crackles, barely audibly:{/n} "I... am glad... to see you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel détourne aussitôt le regard, comme si vous aviez subitement perdu tout intérêt à ses yeux. Cependant, il prononce ces quelques mots d'une voix grésillante, à peine audible :{/n} « Je... suis content... de vous voir. »
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel aparta la mirada enseguida, como si hubiese perdido todo interés por ti. Sin embargo, luego su voco sintetizador emite unos sonidos casi inaudibles:{/n} «Me... alegro... de verle».
languages.original_text: {n}Abel immediately looks away as if he has lost all interest in you. But then his vox crackles, barely audibly:{/n} "I... am glad... to see you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel aparta la mirada enseguida, como si hubiese perdido todo interés por ti. Sin embargo, luego su vocosintetizador emite unos sonidos casi inaudibles:{/n} «Me... alegro... de verle».
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel, sana olan tüm ilgisini kaybetmiş gibi anında başka tarafa dönüyor. Sonrasında voksundan, güçlükle duyulan bir çıtırtı yükseliyor.{/n} "Sizi... Gördüğüme... Sevindim."
languages.original_text: {n}Abel immediately looks away as if he has lost all interest in you. But then his vox crackles, barely audibly:{/n} "I... am glad... to see you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel sana dair tüm ilgisini kaybetmiş gibi anında başka tarafa bakıyor ama ardından voksu, güçlükle duyulabilecek şekilde çıtırdıyor:{/n} "Sizi... Gördüğüme... Sevindim."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
